channel.title: A couple questions, please help me out!
channel.description: 1. How do i add or make items on a private server? 2. If it says on the server; owned by and all that how do i add me on to it as well as, of course if i add stuff? 3. How do i change the name of the server? 4. Is there a way i can upload the server on to a website, so others can download?

item.title: A couple questions, please help me out!
item.dc:creator: @rob_all_over rob all over
item.description:
@rob_all_over wrote:

for the adding item thing you have to get the model id in .rar form then add it to the models folder named with numbers.
then add the ints which are information on right clicks and how you wear it
then go into your server and type: add model ####
for making the ints well its sorta hard to explain what this

you dont need the make part but the adding is correct

Read full topic
item.source: A couple questions, please help me out!

item.title: A couple questions, please help me out!
item.dc:creator: @Lord_of_fallen_Angel Lord of fallen Angels
item.description:
@Lord_of_fallen_Angel wrote:

    • Items are made using software found on the internet, then compressed into a Data file and stored in your cache, which then your server will read off the cache.
    • Change the configuration in the class files. Usually, if it is a 508 server, it would be in Login.Java. Search (Owner) in that file. For 317’s, it would be in Client.Java.
    • Changing the name can also be found from the files above. 508, the name is placed in Login.Java, 317 it’s in Client.Java.
    • Uploading the server is very possible, just like all the servers here on MoparScape. You will need to compress the contents in the server into a format of .rar, then select a downloading website.
  • Lord of Fallen Angels~!~

Read full topic
